item.title: Has microsoft lost it's way?
item.description: I cannot help but feel, very probably not helped by the rest of the tech press that Microsoft is still struggling to understand what it’s core market is and how to move forward. Look at the current Microsoft mobile phone marketing Lumia: Plus, youâ€™ll stay productive on the go with Microsoft Office Mobile built in And with Microsoft Office and OneDrive (formerly SkyDrive) built in, you can keep on top of your work even when away from your desk
